about_the_game:
Kleopatra is a Cyberpunk Shooting Gallery RPG inspired by sci-fi classics Akira, Blade Runner, and Ghost in the Shell.

Narrative

  • As an imperial agent sent to the lawless asteroid city Kleopatra, you are tasked with a mission from a mysterious master: Find and capture the exile Espada.

  • To complete your mission, you must shoot and slash your way through biker gangs at war over a strange, reality-warping substance named TDE.

  • Along the way, you will enlist the help of various allies and uncover past secrets which will call into question your master's motivations.

Gameplay

  • Enemies attack in waves of three and reduce your health when their attack bars fill up.

  • Use abilities to reset or slow their attack bars and defeat them before they defeat you.

  • Different enemy types will have their own attack patterns and defenses to break through.

  • Earn credits through bounties and shop for optional upgrades to adjust combat difficulty.

  • Explore the city to uncover optional dialogues which provide deeper character insights.

Controls

  • The game is designed for mouse and keyboard controls.
